text: currently I am in Wuhan and Here I am
living with my family and this is
apartment where I am living with my wife
and three kids PhD student Joseph and
his young family has spent nearly all of
the last three weeks inside their home
in Wuhan where the corona virus outbreak
began his family back in the eastern
city of Fez Labov are desperate for them
to be allowed to return they don't have
enough to eat or drink so we are really
worried they can't go outside the
children are very small phenytoin and
Nikita all the other countries have been
taking their people out our government
isn't doing anything China and Pakistan
a close allies flights between the two
are running now as per usual but no one
from Wuhan has been allowed to return
for fear the virus could spread Chinese
officials have praised the authorities
here for not imposing a travel ban on
all passengers from the country and for
trusting them to look after those
Pakistani students stranded in Wuhan
more than 500 students and the citizens
of Pakistan Wuhan they are safe and
sound they are well attended and they
looked after by the local government and
they are embassy the Pakistani embassy
in Beijing is also following the
situation this is my community and I am
outside the apartment you can see here
all the roads are empty no here I am in
vegetable market there are concerns
about how Pakistan could cope with any
outbreak of the corona virus and some
Pakistanis in Wuhan say it's better they
stay there for others they just want to
come home secondo Kimani BBC News
Islamabad
